results.name: First n-fold perfect number divided by 14182439040, or 0 if the quotient is not an integer.
comment: The first n-fold perfect numbers are A007539(n) = 1, 6, 120, 30240, 14182439040, .., for n = 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, ...
For additional comments, references, links, and cross-refs, see A007539 and A227765.
link: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..8
results.author: _Jonathan Sondow_, Jul 29 2013
